channel.title: R3van, Author at VNN
channel.description: Everything about virtual voices, just one click away!

item.title: New Items Available in the Otomachi Una Online Shop!
item.dc:creator: R3van
item.description:
Back in October, Internet Co. revealed the official online goods shop for their eel-themed VOCALOID, Otomachi Una! There was a very limited selection when it first opened – only keychains and fluffy hats – but now the shop offers more goodies based on Una’s three voicebanks: Sugar, Spicy, and Talk Ex! Original Goods Note that all prices include …

The post New Items Available in the Otomachi Una Online Shop! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Back in October, Internet Co. revealed the official online goods shop for their eel-themed VOCALOID, Otomachi Una! There was a very limited selection when it first opened – only keychains and fluffy hats – but now the shop offers more goodies based on Una’s three voicebanks: Sugar, Spicy, and Talk Ex!

Original Goods

Note that all prices include tax. 

Plush Otaman Hat (Sugar): ¥3,980 ($35 USD)

Plush Otaman Hat (Spicy): ¥3,980 ($35 USD)

Plush Otaman Hat (Talk Ex): ¥3,980 ($35 USD)

Acrylic Keychain (Sugar, Spicy, Talk Ex): ¥700 ($6 USD)

Acrylic Keychain (Sugar): ¥700 ($6 USD)

Acrylic Keychain (Spicy): ¥700 ($6 USD)

Acrylic Keychain (Talk Ex): ¥700 ($6 USD)

New Goods

Note that all prices include tax.

Plush Doll (Sugar): ¥2,400 ($21 USD)

Plush Doll (Spicy): ¥2,400 ($21 USD)
Plush Doll (Talk Ex): ¥2,400 ($21 USD)

Phone Case (Talk Ex): ¥4,500 ($40 USD)

Able to fit: iPhone 6, iPhone 7 and Multi-form 

Sticker Set (Sugar): ¥300 ($3 USD)

Sticker Set (Spicy): ¥300 ($3 USD)

Sticker Set (Talk Ex): ¥300 ($3 USD)
Sticker Set (Variety): ¥300 ($3 USD)

Where to Buy

All these items are available for immediate purchase on Otomachi Una’s online shop here. Shipping costs ¥700 ($6 USD) per order. However, those living outside of Japan will have to use a forward / proxy service.

Fans can also take advantage of a coupon for orders over ¥1,000 ($9 USD) by friending Una’s LINE account and sending them the message “グッズクーポン” . You can find and scan their QR code here!

Some of the goodies are going fast, so be sure to order them before they’re sold out!

Source: Otomachi Una Official Twitter

The post New Items Available in the Otomachi Una Online Shop! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Hatsune Miku Facial Recognition Avatar Now Available in SNOW!
item.dc:creator: R3van
item.description:
From now until the end of November 2017, users of the SNOW app can take a selfie or video with the twin-tailed virtual diva, Hatsune Miku! What is SNOW? SNOW, from SNOW Inc., is described as being a video messaging app with over 100 million downloads worldwide! From the app’s description: You can send funny …

The post Hatsune Miku Facial Recognition Avatar Now Available in SNOW! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
From now until the end of November 2017, users of the SNOW app can take a selfie or video with the twin-tailed virtual diva, Hatsune Miku!

What is SNOW?

SNOW, from SNOW Inc., is described as being a video messaging app with over 100 million downloads worldwide! From the app’s description:

  • You can send funny stickers to your friends in video calls
  • Take a fun video with live face effects and send it to friends
  • Send a video note instantly while chatting and invite friends to a group chat
  • Add a video to Story to share your moments with friends
  • Friends can view your video only once. No more worries for ridiculous selfies

Other companies that helped create the app’s features include SenseTime for Face Technology, and NALBI.Inc. for Image Segmentation Technology.

Miku X SNOW

Users of the app will find that there is a new AR filter with Hatsune Miku’s face. Once selected, an AR avatar of KEI‘s original V2 Hatsune Miku will appear and track your movements! She is capable of mimicking head, eye, mouth, and even eyebrow movements. Here are some some pictures of SNOW’s staff trying it out:

#初音ミク(@cfm_miku)× #SNOW 再び
表情に連動してミクも動く、#Live2D スタンプリリース♪
あなたも二次元キャラクターに変身
周りのみんなを、みっくみくにしちゃお♡♡今すぐSNOW⇨https://t.co/WdETlPkPaJ pic.twitter.com/H8NMnZRaaR

— SNOW App(Official) (@SNOW_jp_SNOW) October 31, 2017

#初音ミク (@cfm_miku) x #SNOW are at it again

We have released the #Live2D avatar of Miku who can follow your facial expressions♪

You, too, can become a 2D character

It’s got everyone here doing the Mikku Miku♡♡ Get SNOW here⇨ https://t.co/WdETlPkPaJ

This is actually the second time that SNOW that has collaborated with Hatsune Miku. They have previously worked together create Miku hair and necktie graphics for the Ultra Teens Fes earlier this year. Here are some pictures of the Crypton staff giving the app a go.

The app is available for free from the iTunes Store and Google Play! Note that new users will have to create a SNOW account or login through other social media platforms.

Source: Hatsune Miku Official Blog

The post Hatsune Miku Facial Recognition Avatar Now Available in SNOW! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: “Daughter of Evil” Digital Comic and Novel Now Available!
item.dc:creator: R3van
item.description:
The tragic VOCALOID song series “Story of Evil” has recently gained a lot of popularity due to the “Daughter of Evil” musical that took place back in June. And now, the hype continues as the story is distributed in digital comic form! About the Comic On November 2nd, publishing company HarperCollins Japan launched a pair …

The post “Daughter of Evil” Digital Comic and Novel Now Available! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The tragic VOCALOID song series “Story of Evil” has recently gained a lot of popularity due to the “Daughter of Evil” musical that took place back in June. And now, the hype continues as the story is distributed in digital comic form!

About the Comic

On November 2nd, publishing company HarperCollins Japan launched a pair of new electronic labels titled “Character Vocal Novel” and “Character Vocal Comics.” The company aims to publish and distribute novelizations and comics based on popular VOCALOID stories in digital form, starting with “Daughter of Evil.”

HarperCollins Japan’s first digital publications will be the “Daughter of Evil: Clôture of Yellow” light novel, and the “Daughter Evil: Act 1” comic. In the future, the company will aim to release more digital comics and novels based on VOCALOID songs such as “Secret ~Black Vow~,” “Secret Police,” “Sakura no Ame,” “Prisoner,” and “Paper Plane.“

HarperCollins Japan will be working with PHP Institute, VG Books, and Enterbrain KCG Books to get their VOCALOID song comics and novelizations published and distributed digitally for the reduced price of ¥600 (~$5), excluding tax.

Where to Buy

Purchase “Daughter of Evil: Clôture of Yellow” on Amazon
Purchase “Daughter of Evil: Act 1” on Amazon

Future Lineup

Under the “Character Vocal Novel” label:

Sakura no Ame: We Are Not Alone: November 16th, 2017
Daughter of Evil: Wiegenlied of Green: December 7th, 2017
Prisoner & Paper Plane: Youth Paradox: December 21st, 2017
Secret ~Black Vow~: January 18th, 2018
Secret Police FILE:01-Escape: February 1st, 2018
Sakura no Ame: Our Miraculous Chance Encounter: February 15th, 2018

Under the “Character Vocal Comics” label:

Daughter of Evil: Act 2: November 16th, 2017
Daughter of Evil: Act 3: December 7th, 2017
Daughter of Evil: Act 4: December 21, 2017

Source: IT Media, ValuePress!

The post “Daughter of Evil” Digital Comic and Novel Now Available! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: New Racing Miku and Racing Luka Merch From COCOLLABO Now Available!
item.dc:creator: R3van
item.description:
Good Smile Racing‘s last race in the SuperGT series is on November 11th, and COCOLLABO is selling their Racing Miku 2017 and Racing Luka merch on their website to help fans get prepared! Racing Luka Merch Note that all prices include tax. T-shirt sizes reflect the the Japanese sizing scale.  Full Graphic T-Shirt: ¥5940 (~$52 …

The post New Racing Miku and Racing Luka Merch From COCOLLABO Now Available! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Good Smile Racing‘s last race in the SuperGT series is on November 11th, and COCOLLABO is selling their Racing Miku 2017 and Racing Luka merch on their website to help fans get prepared!

Racing Luka Merch

Note that all prices include tax. T-shirt sizes reflect the the Japanese sizing scale. 

Full Graphic T-Shirt: ¥5940 (~$52 USD)

Size Availability: M, L, XL. Made from 100% cotton.

Mobile Battery Pack: ¥4320 (~$38 USD)

Charging capacity is 4000 mAh and can charge most smartphones. Comes with a micro USD cable.

 ID/Credit Card Holder: ¥2980 (~$26 USD)

Dimensions: 110 x 177 mm (~ 4.5 x 7.0 in). Made from synthetic leather.

Android Smartphone Case: ¥3480 (~$31 USD)

Size availability: S, M, L

Racing Miku 2017 Merch

Note that all prices include tax. T-shirt sizes reflect the the Japanese sizing scale. 

Smartphone Case (Vol. 1): ¥3480 (~$31 USD)

Size availability: S, M, L. Only supports Android devices.

Smartphone Case (Ver. 2): ¥3480 (~$31 USD)

Size availability: S, M, L. Only supports Android devices.

Mobile Battery Pack (Ver. 1): ¥4320 (~$38 USD)

Charging capacity is 4000 mAh and can charge most smartphones. Comes with a micro USD cable.

Mobile Battery Pack (Ver. 2): ¥4320 (~$38 USD)

Charging capacity is 4000 mAh and can charge most smartphones. Comes with a micro USD cable.

 

ID/Credit Card Holder: ¥2980 (~$26 USD)

Dimensions: 110 x 177 mm (~ 4.5 x 7.0 in). Made from synthetic leather.

Acrylic Smartphone Stand: ¥2160 (~$19 USD)

Body dimensions: 155 x 112 mm (~6.0 x 4.5 in). Stand dimensions: 95 x 95 mm (~3.5 x 3.5 in)

Full Graphic Blanket: ¥5400 (~$48 USD)

Dimensions: 735 x 1000 mm (~2.5 x 3.3 ft). Surface side is made from satin while the underside is made from fleece.

Full Graphic T-Shirt: ¥5940 (~$52 USD)

Size Availability: M, L, XL 

Die Cut Cushion: ¥3240 (~$29 USD)

Dimensions: 460 x 300 cm (~1.5 x 1.0 ft) Made from polyester satin.

Glow-in-the-Dark IC Card Sticker: ¥1728 (~$15 USD USD)

Dimensions: 92 x 50 mm (~3.5 x 2.0 in).

Smartphone Ring Stand (Ver. 1): ¥1620 (~$14 USD)

Dimensions: 38 x 48 mm (~1.5 x 2.0 in).

Smartphone Ring Stand (Ver. 2): ¥1620 (~$14 USD)

Dimensions: 38 x 48 mm (~1.5 x 2.0 in).

Round Towel: ¥8100 (~$71 USD)

About 1450 mm (~57 in) in diameter. Made from polyester and cotton.

Acrylic Clock: ¥3980 (~$35 USD)

Dimensions: 170 x 100 mm (~6.5 x 4.0 in)

Racing Miku 2017: TeamUKYO Ver. Merch

Note that all prices include tax. T-shirt sizes reflect the the Japanese sizing scale. 

  Smartphone Case: ¥3480 (~$31 USD)

Size availability: S, M, L. Supports Android and iOS devices.

Mobile Battery Pack: ¥4320 (~$38 USD)

Charging capacity is 4000 mAh and can charge most smartphones. Comes with a micro USD cable.

Glow-in-the-Dark IC Card Sticker: ¥1728 (~$15 USD)

Dimensions:92 x 55 mm (~4.5 x 2.0 in)

Full Graphic T-Shirt: ¥5940 (~$52 USD)

Size availability: M, L, XL. Made from 100% cotton.

Other Merch

Note that all prices include tax. T-shirt sizes reflect the the Japanese sizing scale. 

Racing Miku Collapsible Container: ¥7020 (~$62 USD)

Dimensions: 493 x 335 x 304 mm (~19.5 x 13.0 x 12.0 in). Holds up to 50.2 L. Manufactured by Sanko Plastics Co. Ltd.

Racing Miku 2017: Thai Ver. Full Graphic T-Shirt: ¥5940 (~$52 USD)

Size availability: M, L, XL. Made from 100% cotton.

Racing Miku Scrunchie: ¥756 (~$7 USD)

About 110 mm (~4.5 in) in diameter.

Where to Buy

The Racing Luka merch is available from COCOLLABO’s online shop here while the Racing Miku 2017 merch is available here. Be sure to get some and support GSR!

Domestic shipping within Japan costs ¥540 yen (~$5 USD) unless you purchase at least ¥2000 yen (~$18 USD) worth of merch, in which case shipping costs will be waived. However, for those living outside of Japan, a forwarder/proxy service will be needed.

Source: Good Smile Racing Ameblo

The post New Racing Miku and Racing Luka Merch From COCOLLABO Now Available! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Otomachi Una Official Online Shop is Now Open!

The first eel-themed VOCALOID Otomachi Una now has an official online shop where fans can get some unique goodies! Currently, the selection is quite limited, with only keychains and huge stuffed hats being sold, but there will likely be more variety later on. All of the items feature Una’s three voicebanks: Sugar, Spicy, and Talk Ex! …

The post Otomachi Una Official Online Shop is Now Open! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The first eel-themed VOCALOID Otomachi Una now has an official online shop where fans can get some unique goodies! Currently, the selection is quite limited, with only keychains and huge stuffed hats being sold, but there will likely be more variety later on. All of the items feature Una’s three voicebanks: Sugar, Spicy, and Talk Ex!

The Goods

Acrylic Keychain (Sugar, Spicy, Talk Ex): ¥700($6 USD) (including tax)

Acrylic Keychain (Sugar): ¥700($6 USD) (including tax)

Acrylic Keychain (Spicy): ¥700($6 USD) (including tax)

Acrylic Keychain (Talk Ex): ¥700($6 USD)(including tax)

Stuffed Hat (Sugar): ¥3,980($35 USD)(including tax)

Stuffed Hat (Spicy): ¥3,980($35 USD)(including tax)

Stuffed Hat (Talk Ex): ¥3,980($35 USD)(including tax)

Where to Buy

All of these goods are available for immediate purchase on Otomachi Una’s online shop here! Shipping costs ¥700($6 USD) per order. However, those living outside of Japan will have to use a forwarder/proxy service.

Otomachi Una’s Twitter also announced that those who friend Una’s LINE account and send them a message saying “グッズクーポン” can take advantage of a coupon for orders over ¥1,000($9 USD)! You can find and scan their QR code here!

?【お知らせ】音街ウナのオフィシャルグッズショップ（ネットショップ）がオープンしました♪?
?LINE＠でお得なクーポンもあります♪??
?よろしくおねがいします♪є(๑´◎`)๑_ _))ﾍﾟｺﾘ????‍https://t.co/sJs8cNwE1o pic.twitter.com/mBQ2JeDNuz

— 音街ウナ公式?11/3超パーティー? (@otomachiuna) October 25, 2017

 

Sources: Vocaloid Buy Blog, Otomachi Una Twitter

The post Otomachi Una Official Online Shop is Now Open! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: “The Art of VOCALOID MAIKA” Artbook Kickstarter Has Launched!
item.dc:creator: R3van
item.description:
For about two years, the main illustrator of MAIKA, Noriko Hayashi, was thinking of creating an artbook filled with her illustrations of the Spanish VOCALOID. Now, that dream is closer to becoming a reality with the Kickstarter project “The Art of VOCALOID MAIKA”. About the Project The book will include: Predesigns Unpublished sketches Unpublished redesigns All …

The post “The Art of VOCALOID MAIKA” Artbook Kickstarter Has Launched! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
For about two years, the main illustrator of MAIKA, Noriko Hayashi, was thinking of creating an artbook filled with her illustrations of the Spanish VOCALOID. Now, that dream is closer to becoming a reality with the Kickstarter project “The Art of VOCALOID MAIKA”.

About the Project

The book will include:

  • Predesigns
  • Unpublished sketches
  • Unpublished redesigns
  • All the art featured in the PVs Que Decida El Corazón, Cosmonauts and Quiero un dinosaurio
  • And promotional arts

Noririn will also add new designs to the artbook too, such as the final art from the Sky MAIKA contest!

Check out Noririn’s video talking about the project from her YouTube channel!

Goals

There are total of five, different goals:

  1. 2500€ (~$2946 USD): Artbook gets printed
  2. 3500€ (~$4125 USD): Double the quantity of artbooks printed, four new pages, and free postcard
  3. 5000€ (~$5893 USD): More artbooks printed, backers receive exclusive keychains designed for the campaign, 10 more pages added to the artbook
  4. 7000€ (~$8250 USD): Even more artbooks printed, add 10 more pages, guest artists and new 3D exclusive model by adan-YoiStyle
  5. 10,000€ (~$11,785 USD): Art commissions for the artbook drawn by well-known artists such as KEI, Akatsuki Gomoku, iXima, KKUEM, etc., add 10 more pages

Reward Tiers

Note: Descriptions are taken directly off of the Kickstarter page.

1€ (~$1.18 USD) or more: Everything is welcome! 

  • Thank you message! (digital)

5€ (~$6 USD) or more: You’re making this possible! 

  • Thank you message!
  • Your name will appear in the Artbook!

15€ (~$18 USD) or more: Enjoy it digitally! 

  • Thank you message!
  • Your name will appear in the Artbook!
  • Digital version of the Artbook!

25€ (~$29 USD) or more: First physical reward!

  • Thank you message!
  • Your name will appear in the Artbook!
  • Digital version of the Artbook!
  • Physical version of the Artbook!

50€ (~$59 USD) or more: Complete pack  *only 30 available*

  • Thank you message!
  • Your name will appear in the Artbook!
  • Digital version of the Artbook!
  • Physical version of the Artbook with signed sketch!
  • 2 random A5 prints!
  • Set of 4 badges!
  • Acrylic keychain!

75€ (~$88 USD) or more: Sharing is caring! *only 15 available*

  • Thank you message!
  • Your name will appear in the Artbook!
  • Digital version of the Artbook!
  • 2× Physical version of the Artbook with signed sketch!
  • 4 random A5 prints!
  • Set of 4 badges!
  • 2 different acrylic keychains!

100€ (~$118 USD) or more: Merchan collector *only 10 available*

  • Thank you message!
  • Your name will appear in the Artbook!
  • Digital version of the Artbook!
  • 2× Physical version of the Artbook with signed sketch!
  • 4 random A5 prints!
  • Set of 4 badges!
  • 2 different acrylic keychains!
  • Acrylic figure with stand!
  • Exclusive T-shirt!

200€ (~$236 USD) or more: I want EVERYTHING *only 5 available*

  • Thank you message!
  • Your name will appear in the Artbook!
  • Digital version of the Artbook!
  • 2× Physical version of the Artbook with signed sketch!
  • 4 random A5 prints!
  • Set of 4 badges!
  • 2 different acrylic keychains!
  • Acrylic figure with stand!
  • 2× Exclusive T-shirt!
  • Adorable MAIKA mug!
  • Exclusive original MAIKA art for you signed and dedicated

Where to Donate

You can donate to The Art of VOCALOID MAIKA from the Kickstarter here. The project has until Friday, December 1st by 5pm EST to reach its first goal of 2500€ (~$2946 USD). At the time this article was written, the project is already almost 82% funded. So be sure to donate before the deadline!

The post “The Art of VOCALOID MAIKA” Artbook Kickstarter Has Launched! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: MEIKO 13th Anniversary Goods at Animate and Movic!
item.dc:creator: R3van
item.description:
MEIKO, the first Japanese-language VOCALOID to be produced and released, is soon going to be celebrating her 13th anniversary on November 5th! In light of this, Animate JP and Movic are selling various, exclusive goodies featuring MEIKO and her Cryptonloid friends! The Goods Clear File: ¥350 each (excluding tax) Illustrations are by MACCO and Fujinoki …

The post MEIKO 13th Anniversary Goods at Animate and Movic! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
MEIKO, the first Japanese-language VOCALOID to be produced and released, is soon going to be celebrating her 13th anniversary on November 5th! In light of this, Animate JP and Movic are selling various, exclusive goodies featuring MEIKO and her Cryptonloid friends!

The Goods

Clear File: ¥350 each (excluding tax)

Illustrations are by MACCO and Fujinoki Tomoko (ふじのきともこ), respectively.

Can Badge: ¥500 each (excluding tax)

Acrylic Keychain: ¥650 each (excluding tax)

Mini Towel: ¥500 each (excluding tax)

Big MEIKO Acrylic Keychain: ¥1,000 (excluding tax)

Flake Stickers: ¥400 (excluding tax)

Where to Buy

The goods are available for purchase from Movic’s online shop here and Animate’s online shop here! Be advised that those living outside of Japan will have to use a forwarder/proxy service.

Most of the goods will be released on November 9th while the flake sticker pack is set for release on November 16th, 2017!

– – – –

Sources: Vocaloid Buy Blog, Piapro Blog

The post MEIKO 13th Anniversary Goods at Animate and Movic! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Yumemi Nemu Official MMD Model Released!
item.dc:creator: R3van
item.description:
Earlier in the year we were teased of a Yumemi Nemu MMD model to celebrate the V4 release of both her and her counterpart, Tone Rion V4. And now, at long last, she’s available for download! About the Model Nemu’s MMD perfectly mirrors the VOCALOID’s adorable look – with the long, yet loose, knee-high socks …

The post Yumemi Nemu Official MMD Model Released! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Earlier in the year we were teased of a Yumemi Nemu MMD model to celebrate the V4 release of both her and her counterpart, Tone Rion V4. And now, at long last, she’s available for download!

About the Model

Nemu’s MMD perfectly mirrors the VOCALOID’s adorable look – with the long, yet loose, knee-high socks to the large, white and grey coat that covers her entire hands! Yukiko Horiguchi (堀口悠紀子) is the designer of the the model while Tamataro (タマタロー) handled the modeling.

We first got a glimpse of Nemu’s MMD model back in July when Denpagumi Inc. uploaded a short video to the song “Arui wa Yumemi Nemu to Iu Gainen e no Succeed” on their official YouTube channel, which you can check out below.

She is available for free download at Nemu and Rion’s website. Just be sure to read the terms of service outlined on the download page and select the box that says you agree to them.

The post Yumemi Nemu Official MMD Model Released! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Hatsune Miku 10th Anniversary x Nicocafe Coming to NicoNico Headquarters!
item.dc:creator: R3van
item.description:
NicoVideo announced that the Hatsune Miku 10th Anniversary x Nicocafe collaboration will begin this August at Nico Nico Headquarters! This unique cafe will have special foods, drinks, merchandise, and even a special workshop on Miku’s birthday! Food and Drinks Like with all cafes, there are many kinds of foods and drinks. Unlike most cafes, however, …

The post Hatsune Miku 10th Anniversary x Nicocafe Coming to NicoNico Headquarters! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
NicoVideo announced that the Hatsune Miku 10th Anniversary x Nicocafe collaboration will begin this August at Nico Nico Headquarters! This unique cafe will have special foods, drinks, merchandise, and even a special workshop on Miku’s birthday!

Food and Drinks

Like with all cafes, there are many kinds of foods and drinks. Unlike most cafes, however, the refreshments at the Miku cafe are based on popular Miku songs such as Love Trial and SLoWMoTIoN!

The full list of songs serving as inspiration are:

  • Love Trial
  • Tale of the Deep Sea Lily
  • Solitary Envy
  • 2D Dream Fever
  • Alien Alien
  • Envy Catwalk
  • Senbonzakura
  • The Disappearance of Hatsune Miku
  • Popipo
  • Romeo and Cinderella
  • Ghost Rule
  • Two-Breaths Walking
  • SLoWMoTIoN
  • *Hello, Planet
  • Dune*

As a bonus treat, each collaboration menu purchase comes with a free coaster. One design is the Hatsune Miku 10th Anniversary illustration while the others are stills from the above-mentioned songs’ PV’s.

*Dune does not include free gifts.

NicoNico’s Headquarters will have Miku songs playing on the monitors, so you can watch your favorite Miku music videos while enjoying your meal!

Merchandise

There will also be many Miku goodies up for sale! Some of the items come from Snow Miku Skytown while others are from the Don Quijote x Miku collaboration.

Three different versions of the Hatsune Miku 10th Anniversary Album「Re:Start」will be available too! From T-shirts to key chains to posters, it’s almost impossible to not get something!

Hatsune Miku Birthday Special Workshop

On August 31st (Miku’s anniversary), key members of the VOCALOID community, such as koyori, doriko, Asibuto Penta and more, will celebrate the diva’s day with a special workshop. Together, they will discuss how Hatsune Miku and Niconico’s culture developed over the past decade. The workshop will be streamed live on Niconico Live Streaming that you can view here.

This special workshop begins at 18:30 JST and is free to the public.

NicoBox and Hatsune Miku 10th Anniversary Collaboration

Nicobox is an iOS/Android smart phone application used to specifically play music on Niconico Douga. During the collaboration period, NicoBox will have several special features: Hatsune Miku songs chosen for the collaboration menu and top Hatsune Miku songs posted on Niconico in the past will be made into a playlist for users to enjoy. On the “ミク曲診断 (Miku Song Diagnosis)” page , users can also look up Miku songs which were uploaded on their birthday.
In addition, on August 31st, Miku’s birthday, NicoBox will be dressed up in a Hatsune Miku theme.

NicoBox can be downloaded for free from the links below:

– Android version Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=jp.nicovideo.nicobox

– iOS version App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/app/apple-store/id421753493

Event Information

  • Location: NicoNico Headquarters: Ikebukuro P’PARCO, 1-28-2, Minamiikebukuro, Toshima-ku, Tokyo, 171-0022
  • Dates: August 28th to September 11th with the Birthday Workshop on August 31st
  • Reservations: first come, first serve
  • Rules: there is a general list of rules for the Nicocafe that you can read here. These include: how long a customer can stay, how many food items they can order, etc.

Be sure to visit the Hatsune Miku 10th anniversary cafe if you’ll be in the area!

– – – –

Sources: Vocaloid Buy Blog, NicoVideo Special Page

The post Hatsune Miku 10th Anniversary x Nicocafe Coming to NicoNico Headquarters! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: “Hatsune Miku 10th Anniversary Book” is up for Pre-Order!
item.dc:creator: R3van
item.description:
KADOKAWA’s “Hatsune Miku 10th Anniversary Book” is up for pre-order on Amazon Japan to prepare for the VOCALOID’s soon-approaching 10th anniversary! The book contains a multitude of stuff including: interviews, CD’s, the history of Miku, and more! Shipping will begin on August 31st – Miku’s anniversary! The book, of course, starts with the cover image: Miku …

The post “Hatsune Miku 10th Anniversary Book” is up for Pre-Order! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
KADOKAWA’s “Hatsune Miku 10th Anniversary Book” is up for pre-order on Amazon Japan to prepare for the VOCALOID’s soon-approaching 10th anniversary! The book contains a multitude of stuff including: interviews, CD’s, the history of Miku, and more! Shipping will begin on August 31st – Miku’s anniversary!

The book, of course, starts with the cover image:

Miku seems to be enjoying her performance! As she strikes a pose, it looks like she’s inviting you to to share her enthusiasm!

Inside the book

“Hatsune Miku 10th Anniversary Book” is 144 pages packed with:

  • The authors’ favorite Miku songs over the years
  • Her full history from 2007 to 2017
  • A collection of illustrations that were posted on Twitter
  • Discussions over popular “Hall of Fame” songs such as:
    • Miku Miku ni Shite Ageru
    • Romeo and Cinderella
    • The Disappearance of Hatsune Miku
    • Tell Your World
    • Bad ∞ End ∞ Night
    • Blessing
    • Hibikase
    • Hand in Hand
    • Ghost Rule
    • Alien Alien
    • and many more!

Bonus CD

The book will also come with a bonus CD that features new songs by popular VOCALOID producers!

Here’s the tracklist:

  • 01. It’s a Dragon Party (by HitoshizukuP x Yama△)
  • 02. Nice to Meet You (by LamazeP)
  • 03. Sankyuu (by Toa)
  • 04. Birthday Song for Miku ~ 10th Anniv. Ver. (by Mitchie M feat. Rin/Len, Luka, MEIKO, KAITO)
  • 05. Kimi no Inai Sekai ni wa Oto mo Iro mo Nai (by doriko)

“Hatsune Miku 10th Anniversary Book” is currently up for pre-order only on Amazon Japan here for ￥3,240 Yen. Grab it while you can!
